item.title: ABC Sets Fall Rollout for ‘High Potential,’ ‘Abbott Elementary’ and More Series
item.description: The network will stretch its premieres over several weeks in September and October.

item.title: How to Watch the 2025 ESPY Awards Online Without Cable
item.description: With comedian Shane Gillis to host, the biggest names in sports are set to attend the 33rd annual ESPY Awards to recognize nominees and honorees in more than 20 categories, including best athlete, men

item.title: Michael Strahan, Chip and Joanna Gaines Among Guest Sharks for ‘Shark Tank’ Season 17
item.description: “Shark Tank” Season 17 has set an all-star lineup of guest Sharks, Variety has learned. The season 17 guest Sharks include: Allison Ellsworth, founder and chief brand officer of poppiChip
